local_intent: Perform the primary straight push on the T-block toward the detected target; ensure yaw is 90° and verify success with a corrective nudge if needed.
assumptions: Robot is already near contact from prior steps
Target outline can be re-detected before verification
coherence_with_global: Mirrors global plan: retries for detections, enforce yaw 90°, execute main push (0.2 m, dir 0°), then verify with IsAt and an optional corrective 0.05 m push, matching transfer phase semantics.
